alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Rankin (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 22 at 8:21PM CDT until June 27 at 10:25AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River near Lena affecting Leake County. Pearl River At Jackson affecting Rankin and Hinds Counties. Yockanookany River Near Ofahoma affecting Leake County. Pearl River Near Ratliff`s Ferry affecting Rankin and Madison Counties. Pearl River Near Carthage affecting Leake County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Above Philadelphia affecting Neshoba County. For the Upper Pearl River...including Philadelphia, Edinburg, Carthage, Walnut Grove, Lena, Kosciusko, Ratliff`s Ferry, Ofahoma, Jackson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River At Jackson. * WHEN...From late tonight to late Tuesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 27.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 29.0 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Pearl River Jackson 28.0 27.4 Thu 7 pm CDT 28.9 29.0 29.0 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Friday morning at 830 AM CDT.
